targets.query: SELECT  sum(hit)/(sum(hit)+sum(miss)) FROM "rp_30days"."cache_hit_rate" WHERE ("app" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m), "cache" fill(null)
SELECT max("value")/1000.0/3600.0 FROM "rp_30days"."process_uptime" WHERE ("app" =~ /^$app$/ AND "instance-id" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

alert.message: 即到AI api服务健康检查失败(每3m检查一次，查询最近10m的health，持续超过5m)
alert.name: demo-dev-platform-api Health Check

targets.query: SELECT  mean("mean") as d FROM "rp_30days"."http_server_requests" WHERE ("app" =~ /^$app$/ AND "instance-id" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "uri"
SELECT sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("app" =~ /^$app$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),  fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("status" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("status" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("status" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("status" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "rp_30days"."jvm_memory_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "rp_30days"."jvm_memory_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "rp_30days"."jvm_memory_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "rp_30days"."jvm_memory_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

SELECT percentile("mean", 95) as tp95, percentile("mean", 90)  as tp90, percentile("mean", 50) as tp50 FROM "rp_30days"."http_server_requests" WHERE ("app" = 'dev-platform-api' AND "uri" = '/v1/auth/currentUser') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),"uri"
